languages.text: {n}С болезненным хрипом, доносящимся из вокса, Паскаль прикасается к угасшей трещине в броне таким жестом, словно у него внезапно заболели зубы. С трудом он произносит:{/n} "Гипотеза — данный запрос Префект-вычислителя переводится как "Цель визита?".

{n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. He looks as though he has a sudden toothache, then says with effort,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'"
languages.original_text: {n}С болезненным хрипом, доносящимся из вокса, Паскаль прикасается к угасшей трещине в броне таким жестом, словно у него внезапно заболели зубы. С трудом он произносит:{/n} "Гипотеза — данный запрос Префект-вычислителя переводится как "Цель визита?".

traits.locale_text: {n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. The gesture looks as though he has a sudden toothache. He says, struggling to get the words out,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルがアーマーのひびに触れると、痛々しくきしむ音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえてくる。アーマーはもはや輝きを失っている。突然の歯痛に悩むかのような姿だが、どうにか口を開く。{/n}「仮説：監督列挙子の要求は『訪問目的は何か』と解釈できる」
languages.original_text: {n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. He looks as though he has a sudden toothache, then says with effort,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルがアーマーのひびに触れると、痛々しくきしむ音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえてくる。アーマーはもはや輝きを失っている。突然の歯痛に悩むかのような姿だが、どうにか口を開く。{/n}「仮説：監督列挙子の要求は『訪問目的は何か』と解釈できる」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡触碰了一下不再发光的盔甲裂缝，音阵装置发出了痛苦的嘎嘎声。他费力地开了口，声音听起来像是突然牙疼一般。{/n}“假设：统领计算器的请求应被解释为‘您访问的目的是什么？’”
languages.original_text: {n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. He looks as though he has a sudden toothache, then says with effort,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡触碰了一下不再发光的盔甲裂缝，音阵装置发出了痛苦的嘎嘎声。他费力地开了口，声音听起来像是突然牙疼一般。{/n}“假设：统领计算器的请求应被解释为‘您访问的目的是什么？’”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal émet un cliquetis éprouvé alors qu'il lève une main vers l'entaille dans son armure qui a cessé de luire. Comme s'il était pris d'une soudaine rage de dent, il peine à énoncer :{/n} « Hypothèse : le préfet enumerator veut connaître le but de notre visite. »
languages.original_text: {n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. He looks as though he has a sudden toothache, then says with effort,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal émet un cliquetis éprouvé alors qu'il lève une main vers l'entaille dans son armure qui a cessé de luire. Comme s'il était pris d'une soudaine rage de dent, il peine à énoncer :{/n} « Hypothèse : le préfet enumerator veut connaître le but de notre visite. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal produce un traqueteo de dolor cuando toca la grieta de su armadura, que ya no brilla. Parece como si, de repente, le doliesen las muelas, y luego dice con ahínco:{/n} «Hipótesis: la solicitud del Enumerador de Prefectos se puede interpretar como "¿Cuál es el motivo de vuestra visita?"».
languages.original_text: {n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. He looks as though he has a sudden toothache, then says with effort,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'"

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal produce un traqueteo de dolor cuando toca la grieta de su armadura, que ya no brilla. Parece como si, de repente, le doliesen las muelas, y luego dice con ahínco:{/n} «Hipótesis: la solicitud del Enumerador de Prefectos se puede interpretar como "¿Cuál es el motivo de vuestra visita?"».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein gepeinigtes Rasseln ertönt aus Pasqals Vox, als er den Riss in seiner Rüstung berührt, der nun nicht länger leuchtet. Er sieht aus, als habe er plötzliche Zahnschmerzen bekommen, dann sagt er mit einiger Anstrengung:{/n} "Hypothese: Die Anfrage des Präfekt Enumerator ist zu interpretieren als: 'Welchem Zweck dient Euer Besuch?'"
languages.original_text: {n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. He looks as though he has a sudden toothache, then says with effort,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein gepeinigtes Rasseln ertönt aus Pasqals Vox, als er den Riss in seiner Rüstung berührt, der nun nicht länger leuchtet. Er sieht aus, als habe er plötzliche Zahnschmerzen bekommen, dann sagt er mit einiger Anstrengung:{/n} "Hypothese: Die Anfrage des Präfekt Enumerator ist zu interpretieren als: 'Welchem Zweck dient Euer Besuch?'"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Zırhındaki artık parlamayı bırakmış çatlağa dokunan Pasqal'ın voksundan acılı bir hırıltı çıkıyor. Sanki aniden dişi ağrımaya başlamış gibi görünüyor, güçlükle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hipotez: Prefekt Sayaç'ın talebi, 'Ziyaretinizin sebebi nedir?' şeklinde yorumlanabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}A pained rattle comes from Pasqal's vox as he touches the crack in his armour, which is no longer glowing. He looks as though he has a sudden toothache, then says with effort,{/n} "Hypothesis: the Prefect Enumerator's request is to be interpreted as 'What is the purpose of your visit?'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Zırhındaki artık parlamayı bırakmış çatlağa dokunan Pasqal'ın voksundan acılı bir hırıltı çıkıyor. Sanki aniden dişi ağrımaya başlamış gibi görünüyor ve güçlükle konuşuyor:{/n} "Hipotez: Prefekt Sayaç'ın talebi 'Ziyaretinizin sebebi nedir?' şeklinde yorumlanabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
